package.name: United States Functions
package.author: Dan Hoover
package.description: A group of functions that allow you to deal with US State abbreviations.

function.name: stateFromAbbrevUS($string)
function.description: Returns the full state name when provided with an abbreviation. Returns false if invalid. Deals with capitalization automagically.

function.name: abbrevFromStateUS($string)
function.description: Returns the abbreviation when provided with a state name. Returns false if invalid. Deals with capitalization automagically.

function.name: statesUS()
function.description: Returns an array of US State abbreviations in ABC order. Great for generating forms.
